experience.title: Software Developer - Security Research Services Team
recruiter_description: Scaled malware sandboxing infrastructure by 33x, leading to the detection of 14 novel threats across high-profile clients

Architected and implemented serverless functions using AWS Lambda, managed cross-account IAM permissions, and leveraged Infrastructure as Code (IaC) with Troposphere and CloudFormation for streamlined resource provisioning
Coordinated efforts across security teams to automate threat analysis workflows through Ansible and CI/CD pipeline deployment
experience.quote: "Consistent attitude/emotional state when approaching work, adapted well to changing situations. Looked for opportunities to learn new skills regularly, had a plan in place to develop himself and his skills." - Dallas Rathbone

experience.title: Lead Product Developer
recruiter_description: Led MVP development, including research, system architecture design, chatbot integration with GCP, and LLM fine-tuning
Drove project success through clear communication with non-technical founders, ensuring alignment and clarity

experience.title: Web Developer
recruiter_description: Managed complex database migrations using Laravel, seamlessly integrating critical client configurations and delivering successful demos for 20+ international banking clients, benefiting over 90 million end-users
Improved backend PHP infrastructure, accelerating configuration updates and enhancing developer efficiency by up to 20%
experience.quote: "Jaryd consistently displayed an insatiable drive for growth, always eager to delve deeper, expand his knowledge, and make meaningful contributions. His enthusiasm encompassed every facet of the opportunity presented to him: embracing emerging technologies, collaborating within teams, and embracing novel approaches to software development." - Kirk Lalchan

experience.title: Software Developer
recruiter_description: Engineered various full-stack client projects using the MERN stack (MySQL/MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js), including development of high-performance migration scripts that successfully mapped 80,000+ legacy client records to a MongoDB database
Built full-stack MLOps platform for real-time model monitoring and metrics, driving adoption into core product suite
experience.quote: "His ability to be both dynamic and detail oriented is very impressive. Jaryd's work will continue to be utilized by the team, well beyond his internship." - Jessica Ascunion

experience.title: Software Developer
recruiter_description: Developed production-ready financial visualization tools with React, Flask, and C++, launching in key product offering
Collaborated directly with co-founders to innovate and streamline features, achieving a 100% improvement in website load times
experience.quote: "Jaryd was an amazing collaborator and was able to apply his knowledge and abilities to produce high quality results. We were also impressed with how fast he was able to learn new tools." - Manjeet Ram
